name: ...I Will Make Whitebeard The King
text: Main If your Leader has "Whitebeard Pirates" in its types, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Character with a cost of 9 or lower with "Whitebeard Pirates" in its types, you may play it. If you played it, it gains Rush during this turn.

effect.text: If your Leader has "Whitebeard Pirates" in its types, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Character with a cost of 9 or lower with "Whitebeard Pirates" in its types, you may play it. If you played it, it gains Rush during this turn.
